001package io.jstach.opt.dropwizard.example;
002
003import com.codahale.metrics.health.HealthCheck;
004
005/**
006 * Ignore this health check
007 *
008 * @author agentgt
009 * @hidden
010 */
011public class TemplateHealthCheck extends HealthCheck {
012
013        private final String template;
014
015        /**
016         * Ignore for now
017         * @param template ignore
018         */
019        public TemplateHealthCheck(String template) {
020                this.template = template;
021        }
022
023        @Override
024        protected Result check() throws Exception {
025                final String saying = String.format(template, "TEST");
026                if (!saying.contains("TEST")) {
027                        return Result.unhealthy("template doesn't include a name");
028                }
029                return Result.healthy();
030        }
031
032}
